headline: Potter's job at West Ham under serious threat
summary: West Ham head coach Graham Potter's position is under significant internal scrutinity with the club now considering managerial alternatives.

headline: Potter under pressure as West Ham beaten at home by Crystal Palace
summary: Pressure continues to mount on West Ham manager Graham Potter as he sees his side fall to fourth Premier League defeat of the season, losing 2-1 at home to Crystal Palace.

headline: 'Vultures are circling' for Potter at West Ham - Given
summary: Final Score's Dion Dublin and Shay Given discuss the "severe pressure" facing West Ham United manager Graham Potter after their 2-1 defeat to Crystal Palace on Saturday.
